name: Forward gram by ai
description: forward Telegram files from one channel to other !!

TG_API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID. Get this value from my.telegram.org!

TG_API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API hash. Get this value from my.telegram.org!

input_channel_names.description: Name of the channel from where you wanted to sent the message

output_channel_names.description: Name of the channel you want to recive messages
